caption.p: ( a) Dendogram of the A. millefolium EO constituents from this study and from literature reports (the samples are marked according to Table 6); ( b) correlation network based on A. millefolium EO constituents (SAB—sabinene; B-PIN— β-pinene; CMP—camphor; 1,8-CIN—1,8-cineole; BOR—borneole; T-4-OL—terpinene-4-ol; BOR-A—bornyl acetate; CHR-A—chrysanthenyl acetate; LAV-A—lavandulyl acetate; CHA—chamazulene; B-CAR— β-caryophyllene; D-CAD—δ-cadinene; ELE—elemol.
